thread.title: New DNC Chair Perez Tells Trump He's Going To Be His 'Worst Nightmare' - Fox Nation
thread.title_full: New DNC Chair Perez Tells Trump He's Going To Be His 'Worst Nightmare' - Fox Nation

title: New DNC Chair Perez Tells Trump He's Going To Be His 'Worst Nightmare' - Fox Nation
text:
New DNC Chair Perez Tells Trump He's Going To Be His 'Worst Nightmare' Published February 26, 2017 AP 
By Cortney O'Brien, Townhall 
President Trump appeared to be pleased with the Democratic National Committee chair results on Saturday, tweeting a sarcastic congratulations to the victor, Tom Perez, and the Republican Party. Congratulations to Thomas Perez, who has just been named Chairman of the DNC. I could not be happier for him, or for the Republican Party! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 25, 2017 Call me Tom. And don't get too happy. @keithellison and I, and Democrats united across the country, will be your worst nightmare. https://t.co/fu7WvLofrD
